TAP Air Portugal has implemented the following protocols to ensure passenger safety during the pandemic:

1. Mandatory face mask requirement for all passengers and crew throughout the flight.
2. Enhanced cabin cleaning procedures, including frequent disinfection of high-touch surfaces.
3. Limited contact during boarding and disembarking, with controlled boarding procedures to ensure social distancing.
4. Passengers are encouraged to use online check-in and self-service baggage drop to minimize contact.
5. All aircraft are equipped with HEPA filters that capture 99.97% of airborne particles, including viruses.
6. In-flight service has been modified to limit contact, with reduced catering and minimal printed materials.
7. Temperature checks are carried out on all passengers before boarding.
8. Passengers who exhibit symptoms of illness will not be allowed to board the aircraft.
9. TAP Air Portugal staff is trained to identify and manage potential COVID-19 cases.
10. TAP offers a flexible booking policy allowing customers to change their travel dates if needed.
